articles.content: Gold price today at Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) is around 4000 lower from its recent high of 55,558 per 10 gm levels. MCX gold rate on Friday closed at 51,475 levels, ending 0.33 per cent lower fr… [+3830 chars]

articles.author: Rica Bhattacharyya and Sneha Shah
articles.title: Startups board express train chasing top talent in 2022 - Economic Times
articles.description: Net headcount at startups rose more than 11% in the first two months of this year compared with a year earlier, show data from staffing firm Xpheno. Headcount grew 21% at soonicorns and 10% at unicorns, show the data shared exclusively with ET.
articles.content:
Mumbai: Indian unicorns and soonicorns have accelerated their talent hunt in 2022 amid sustained investor interest in the countrys booming startup ecosystem.
